metas.title: About | Decentralized digital identity experts
metas.description: We founded Gataca to build better digital identities

introSection.title: ABOUT
introSection.description:
Gataca is a cybersecurity company founded in Boston, MA, at the heart of MIT’s entrepreneurship and innovation ecosystem. It started as an academic research study seeking to reduce the risk of doing business online. As victims of the Equifax data breach later that year, the topic became very personal.

We built Gataca because we knew there had to be a better way to protect our data.

awards.title: NGI ESSIF-Lab awardee
awards.description: Best graded proposal out of 20 awardees of the NGI ESSIF-Lab, a project funded by the European Commission to advance decentralized digital identities for faster and safer electronic transactions

awards.title: South Summit - Connectivity & Data Winner
awards.description: Winner of the vertical Connectivity & Data, one of the nine winners chosen out of 3,700+ startups

awards.title: 1st prize in RACE by European Blockchain Convention
awards.description: Awarded first place in the February 2020 edition of RACE by EBC, the European Blockchain Convention's startup competition, where ten of the most promising Blockchain startups from the Nordics and Europe presented their projects.

awards.title: Top 10 finalist at Seed Rocket Start-Up Competition
awards.description: Named a top ten start-up in Seed Rocket Accelerator Program, giving access to office space at Google Campus in Madrid as well as valuable networking and mentorship opportunities.

awards.title: Telefonica Open Future Incubator Participant
awards.description: One of twenty start-ups awarded access to work in Telefonica's Incubator in Madrid.

awards.title: MIT FinTech competition Finalist
awards.description: Selected as a finalist for MIT's Annual FinTech Competition, the largest student-organized FinTech Conference in the USA.

awards.title: MIT Sandbox Innovation Grant Recipient
awards.description: Awarded grant from MIT Innovation Sandbox, a program for MIT students to pursue entrepreneurial ideas.
